KnowledgeBase.Title: pair
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Function.Description: The pair function constructs a Pair from the first input argument as the car and the second input argument as the cdr.

Brief.Overview: The pair function constructs a Pair from input argument {obj1} as the car and the argument {obj2} as the cdr; otherwise void is returned.
Brief.Usage: The pair function is used to create a pair from two objects

Argument.Name: obj1
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Argument.Name: obj2
Argument.AISTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Pair List Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean
